doc.title: Stag: Whipped Cream Dreams Uncensored
doc.plot: Watch as all our bachelor's dreams come true... causing their fiancées' nightmares! In our first hot, sticky episode, just when you thought his college "playing" days were over, Chudi's last hoorah comes at his wild bachelor party. But will his latest slam dunk force his fiancée to blow the whistle on his naughty behavior? And at our second wet, slippery party, Conrad's fiancée Tiffany is not concerned about her man's pre-marital send off. Naïve to what her future husband will be exposed to, it doesn't take long for our mild-mannered pair to learn the naked truth... on Stag: Whipped Cream Dreams Uncensored! only on Events IN DEMAND Pay-per-View.
